name: Super Puzzle Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix
name_original: Super Puzzle Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix
description:
Super Puzzle Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix is an arcade-puzzle game developed by Capcom. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Super Puzzle Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
